sentence.Network_en: We must do it whole - heartedly, not half - heartedly.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们要全心全意地做这件事, 而不是半心半意.

sentence.Network_en: I proceed half - heartedly, in a kind of dream.
sentence.Network_cn: 我也象在做梦一样半心 半 意地干着.

sentence.Network_en: But surprisingly, plants use this latter defence system only half - heartedly.
sentence.Network_cn: 但令人吃惊的是, 植物对后一种防御系统的利用缺乏十足的热情.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 危机重重的英国女歌星 ... last-minute 最后一刻 half-heartedly 半心半意地 party lifestyle 派对生活方式.
联准会正准备采取新的方法来挽救，其中有一些只是敷衍了事(half-heartedly)。无论联准会做什麽，美国目前的态度是所有经济大国里 …
half-hearted 决心不大, half-heartedly 半心半意, half-hearted 敷衍的

list.abs: She tried half - heartedly ., 她没有认真的尝试.
to do or take part in half - heartedly ., 玩不认真地做或参加.

entry.def: If someone does something in a half-hearted way, they do it without any real effort, interest, or enthusiasm.

example.ex: Joanna had made one or two half-hearted attempts to befriend Graham's young wife.
example.tran: 乔安娜曾有一两次敷衍着去帮助格雷厄姆年轻的妻子。

means.word_mean: 1. without enthusiasm; in a half-hearted manner;
